## Protocol.Debugger.SetBreakpointByUrlRequest.urlRegex property

Regex pattern for the URLs of the resources to set breakpoints on. Either `url` or `urlRegex` must be specified.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
urlRegex?: string;
```
